titleStmt.title: The follovving of Christ Deuided into foure bookes. Written in Latin by the learned and deuout man Thomas a Kempis chanon-regular of the Order of S. Augustine. And translated into English by B. F.
Imitatio Christi. English.
titleStmt.author: Hoskins, Anthony, 1568-1615.
Thomas, à Kempis, 1380-1471, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The traditional attribution to Thomas a ̀Kempis is disputed.
A translation, by Anthony Hoskins, of: Imitatio Christi.
Place of publication and publisher from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
